statements: UPDATE cryptocurrency_transactions SET transaction_amount = 1000.50, is_suspicious = TRUE WHERE transaction_id = 1234;
UPDATE cryptocurrency_transactions SET sender_address = 'abc123', recipient_address = 'xyz456', transaction_amount = 500.75 WHERE transaction_id = 5678;
UPDATE cryptocurrency_transactions SET transaction_amount = 1000.50, recipient_address = 'Bob', is_suspicious = TRUE WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE cryptocurrency_transactions SET sender_address = 'Alice', recipient_address = 'Eve', transaction_date = '2023-09-15 12:30:00', is_suspicious = FALSE WHERE transaction_id = 67890;

UPDATE transaction_metadata SET metadata_value = 'Important' WHERE metadata_id = 3;

UPDATE Transactions SET amount = 500.00 WHERE transaction_id = 1234
